column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I really loved this place! This was my and my husband's first tapas experience
column2: so neither of us really knew how it worked or what dishes to order. We asked a lot of questions
column5: was so knowledgeable! She was able to describe every dish and make suggestions based off of what we told her we liked. Everything we ate tasted so good! I ate so much! We were there for two hours
column6: and it was such a fun dining/entertainment experience!
